tweet: Are you running a #Cardano Stake pool and want a place to introduce it to the #CardanoCommunity? Look no further. Go to our #CardanoForum, where we have a designated section for you to introduce it. Thanks for all that you do!  Sign up, and post here:  https://t.co/k8YlZQqYUW #ada
@Bitboy_Crypto When he started lying about Cardano, I just couldn't believe the hate and toxicity coming from him. He's also a really bad businessman

At the end of the day, long after Covid is gone, #Cardano will still be here. Long after Covid is gone, our industry will still be here. And during the clean-up phase from this global pandemic, we’ll start asking fundamental questions.   https://t.co/MGbtXWkG43  $ada #blockchain
#Bitcoin was born out of the 2008 financial crisis. #Cardano will be born out of the 2020 #coronavirus crisis.
